alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 15 at 8:57PM MST until March 15 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST FOR PINAL COUNTY... At 856 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Chui-Chu, or 13 miles west of Casa Grande, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande, Arizona City, Arizola and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 187 and 203. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 156 and 178. AZ Route 347 near mile marker 161. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
